get.summary: Returns all customer contacts matching criteria. (INTERNAL)

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: Filter by customer ID or shortname

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Filter by service ID or shortname

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Filter by user ID or shortname

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Limit search to contacts matching these keywords (for either name, email or description). Note: will not search on associated user.

post.summary: Enable a service for a customer contact. (INTERNAL)

get.summary: Returns a customer contact identified by its ID. (INTERNAL)

post.summary: Returns all customer contacts matching criteria. (INTERNAL)

get.summary: Returns a Customer identified by its ID. (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Customer domain to lookup shortname (defaults to current users domain)

get.summary: Returns customers defined by query parameters (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: keywordMatch
parameters.description: Set match strategy for keyword search

parameters.name: keywordField
parameters.description: Set field strategy for keyword search

get.summary: Returns a Customer logo by customer shortname. (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Customer domain to lookup shortname (defaults to current users domain)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The preferred size of the logo (small, medium, large, xlarge). Will also crop the original logo if it is not a square (optional)

get.summary: Deprecated! Use the equivalent end point in the Sensor Service. Search locations by criteria. (PUBLIC)
Returns a set of User roles for the customer id or shortname. (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Customer domain to lookup user (defaults to current users domain)

put.summary: Update user roles of a customer object. (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Customer domain to lookup user (defaults to current users domain)

delete.summary: Disable a service for a customer contact. (INTERNAL)
Remove a service from a customer. (PUBLIC)

put.summary: Move customer to a different parent. (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: ID or shortname of domain to lookup customer in

post.summary: Add a service to a customer. (PUBLIC)

get.summary: Returns a Customer logo by customer shortname or id. (DEV)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Customer domain to lookup shortname (defaults to current users domain)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The preferred size of the logo (small, medium, large, xlarge). Will also crop the original logo if it is not a square (optional)

get.summary: Returns a Customer identified by its ID or short name. (DEV)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Customer domain to lookup short name (defaults to current users domain)

get.summary: Returns a set of User roles for the customer id or shortname. (DEV)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Customer domain to lookup user (defaults to current users domain)

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

disabled.description: If set, specify to disable or enable these settings. Default is specified by parent request.

verbose.description: If set, specify to disable or enable verbose notification. Default is specified by parent request.

action.description: If set, specify on which actions these settings apply. Default is specified by parent request.

priority.description: If set, specify on which priorities these settings apply. Default is specified by parent request.

input.description: If set, specify on which input these settings apply. Default is specified by parent request.

caseType.description: If set, specify on which case types these settings apply. Default is specified by parent request.

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

data.description: Returned results (might be an array or a single object)

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

customer.description: The customer the subject belongs to

offset.description: Skip the first (offset) objects. By default, return result from first object.

includeDeleted.description: Set to true to include deleted objects. By default, exclude deleted objects.

subCriteria.description: Set additional criterias which are applied using a logical OR.

exclude.description: Only relevant for subcriteria. If set to true, objects matching this subcriteria object will be excluded.

required.description: Only relevant for subcriteria. If set to true, objects matching this subcriteria are required (AND-ed together with parent criteria).

customerID.description: Restrict search to data belonging to specified customers.

parentID.description: Search for customers by parent customer ID.

keywordMatchStrategy.description: Defines the MatchStrategy for keywords (default match all keywords).

keywordFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords (default all supported fields).

service.description: Search for customers having any of these services (service shortname).

domain.description: Search for customers in one of these domains (by domain id or name).

skipServices.description: Whether to skip resolving service objects in the search results (default false)

sortBy.description: List of properties to sort by (prefix with "-" to sort descending).

includeFlags.description: Only include objects which have includeFlags set.

excludeFlags.description: Exclude objects which have excludeFlags set.

parentID.description: ID of parent customer group to add this customer to. (default 0)

shortName.description: shortName to set for new customer (must be unique). => [a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.]*

language.description: Language to set for customer. (default ENGLISH)

logoURL.description: Customer logo data url. On format data:image/jpeg;base64,BASE64STRING. => Sanitize by regex data:.*

timeZone.description: Name of timezone to set for customer. (default Europe/Oslo)

accountManagerID.description: ID of account manager to assign to customer. If not set, no account manager is set.

type.description: Object type. If set to GROUP, this customer can have subcustomers. (default CUSTOMER)

excludeFromProduction.description: Mark customer as excluded from production. (default false)

networkBaseCustomer.description: Whether enable customer as base customer for a customer group, used for remapping events' customer by network CIDR among sub-customers that belong to same customer group (group must be SINGLE_NETWORK_DOMAIN flagged), cannot be set for group customer, and once enabled the customer cannot be promoted to group unless disable it. (default false)

singleNetworkDomain.description: Whether enable customer group option for remapping events' customer by network CIDR among its sub-customers, cannot be set for non-group customer, and once enabled the customer group cannot be changed to non-group customer unless disable it. (default false)

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

language.description: If set, change the language this contact should receive notifications in. If the contact is bound to a user, this field is invalid.

name.description: If set, change the displayName of this contact. If the contact is bound to a user, this field is invalid.

email.description: If set, change the email address of this contact. If the contact is bound to a user, this field is invalid. => format:email

workPhone.description: If set, change the work phone number of this contact. If the contact is bound to a user, this field is invalid. => format:phone

mobilePhone.description: If set, change the mobile phone number of this contact. If the contact is bound to a user, this field is invalid. => format:phone

description.description: If set, change the description of this contact. If the contact is bound to a user, this field is invalid.

services.description: If set, overwrite the list of service shortnames or IDs which this contact is enabled for.

mailSettings.description: If set, change parts of the mail settings for this contact. Only the parts of the settings which are specified will be changed.

smsSettings.description: If set, change parts of the SMS settings for this contact. Only the parts of the settings which are specified will be changed.

user.description: The user id or shortname this role is bound to.
The user this role is bound to.

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

name.description: If set, change customer name to this value. => [\s\w\{\}\$\-\(\)\.\[\]"\'_/\\,\*\+\#:@!?;=]*

shortName.description: If set, change customer shortname to this value (must be unique). => [a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.]*

addProperties.description: If set, add these properties. If the keys exist, they will be overwritten. => [\s\w\{\}\$\-\(\)\.\[\]"\'_/\\,\*\+\#:@!?;=]*

deleteProperties.description: If set, remove properties with these keys. Missing keys are ignored.

logoURL.description: If set, change customer logo. On format data:image/jpeg;base64,BASE64STRING. => Sanitize by regex data:.*

timeZone.description: If set, change customer timezone to timezone with this name.

accountManagerID.description: If set, change customer account manmager to specified user.

addFeatures.description: If set, add these features to customer.

deleteFeatures.description: If set, remove these features from customer.

type.description: Customer type. If set to GROUP, this customer can have subcustomers.

excludeFromProduction.description: If set, enable/disable customer as excluded from production

networkBaseCustomer.description: If set, enable/disable customer as base customer for a customer group, used for remapping events' customer by network CIDR among sub-customers that belong to same customer group (group must be SINGLE_NETWORK_DOMAIN flagged), cannot be set for group customer, and once enabled the customer cannot be promoted to group unless disable it.

singleNetworkDomain.description: If set, enable/disable customer group option for remapping events' customer by network CIDR among its sub-customers, cannot be set for non-group customer, and once enabled the customer group cannot be changed to non-group customer unless disable it.

dataDeleted.description: If set, this option indicates that all of Customer data has been deleted. Please do not set this flag if you did not confirm that the customers data has been purged. Setting this option will not delete the data. It is for indication purposes only.

service.description: Name of service to enable on customer

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

flags.description: Set of flags that are on/true for this customer.

type.description: Gives info if a customer is a group or a leaf type customer

userRoles.description: Set of users and roles to update in json format

customer.description: Customer this contact is bound to

language.description: Language this contact should receive notifications in. Disregarded if subject is specified. Defaults to english.

user.description: User ID or shortname for user to bind this contact to. If not specified, name and contact settings must be specified.

name.description: The displayName of this contact. If user is set, this is disregarded.

email.description: The email address of this contact. If user is set, this is disregarded. => format:email

workPhone.description: The work phone number of this contact. If user is set, this is disregarded. => format:phone

mobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of this contact. If user is set, this is disregarded. => format:phone

description.description: A description of this contact. If user is set, this is disregarded.

services.description: A list of service shortnames or IDs for services that this contact should be notified on.

mailSettings.description: The mail settings for this contact. If not set, it defaults to enabled for all settings (non-verbose).

smsSettings.description: The sms settings for this contact. If not set, it defaults to disabled.

service.description: The service to enable for this contact

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

user.description: The user this role is bound to.

customer.description: ID or shortname of customers of contacts to search for. Customer groups will return contacts for all subcustomers.

service.description: ID or shortname of services of contacts to search for. Will return contacts which are bound to any of these services.

user.description: ID or shortname of users of contacts to search for. Will return contacts which is bound to any of these users.

keywords.description: Limit search to contacts matching these keywords (for either name, email or description). Note: will not search on associated user.

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

parent.description: The name or ID of the new parent to move the customer to.

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

count.description: Number of available results on server

metaData.description: Additional unstructured meta data associated with response

messages.description: Contains messages returned from the API, usually error messages

customer.description: The customer this contact is bound to.

language.description: The expected language of this contact.

user.description: The user object of the user linked to this contact. If contact is not linked to a user, this is not set.

name.description: The display name of this contact. If this contact is linked to a user, this returns the users real name.

email.description: The email address set for this contact.

workPhone.description: The work phone set for this contact.

mobilePhone.description: The mobile phone set for this contact.

description.description: A textual description of this contact. If contact is a user, this is not set.

flags.description: Flags set for this contact object

services.description: List of services this contact is enabled for

mailSettings.description: Mail notification settings for this contact

smsSettings.description: SMS notification settings for this contact

createdByUser.description: User info for the user that created this contact

lastUpdatedByUser.description: User info for the user that last updated this contact

deletedByUser.description: User info for the user that last deleted this contact. If contact is not deleted, this field is not set.

createdTimestamp.description: The timestamp when this contact was created.

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: The timestamp when this contact was last updated.

deletedTimestamp.description: The timestamp when this contact was deleted.

domain.description: Domain that this customer belongs to.
